title: Unión Deportivo Ascensión
text:
Unión Deportivo Ascensión is a <a href="Peru">Peru</a>vian <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club, located in the city of <a href="Huancavelica">Huancavelica</a>, <a href="Peru">Peru</a>. 
The club is the largest in Ascensión city and one of the largest in Huancavelica Province. 
The club was founded 18 July 1959 and play in the <a href="Copa%20Per%C3%BA">Copa Perú</a> which is the third division of the Peruvian league.
History.
The club was founded July 18, 1959. 
In the <a href="1980%20Copa%20Per%C3%BA">1980 Copa Perú</a>, the club classified to the Regional Stage, but was eliminated by and <a href="C.D.%20Miguel%20Grau">Miguel Grau</a> and Atlético Centenario.
In the <a href="2002%20Copa%20Per%C3%BA">2002 Copa Perú</a>, the club classified to the National Stage but was eliminated by <a href="Le%C3%B3n%20de%20Hu%C3%A1nuco">León de Huánuco</a> in the quarterfinals.
In the <a href="2010%20Copa%20Per%C3%BA">2010 Copa Perú</a>, the club classified to the Regional Stage, but was eliminated by and Cultural Joe Gutiérrez and <a href="Froebel%20Deportes">Froebel Deportes</a>.
